channel.title: Password box to many character's[Solved]
channel.description:
Hey i am moddifying my client end now i found a small issue when you type in login field you can ahve a max char but when you type in the password field you keep going until you are at the end of your loginbox
so whats the code that decides hwo many char you can enter
picture explmains more then 10000 words :) ->
[img]http://img185.imageshack.us/img185/3362/colorim1.png[/img]

item.title: Password box to many character's[Solved]
item.dc:creator: @supra_s supra s
item.description:
@supra_s wrote:

[quote=“trytohaxme2, post:2, topic:242013”]I’m not quite sure if you set the max characters for the password.
But the only way I can think of doing it, just search what you did for the username.
Then do that with the password?[/quote]

dont got that many time atm other while i would do so i hoped somone knew :p[br][br][size=1]Posted on: November 08, 2008, 05:59:49 am[/size][hr]Solved ~

code in client.java

if(anInt1216 == 0) { if(l1 == 8 && aString1173.length() > 0) aString1173 = aString1173.substring(0, aString1173.length() - 1); if(l1 == 9 || l1 == 10 || l1 == 13) anInt1216 = 1; if(flag1) aString1173 += (char)l1; if(aString1173.length() > 13) aString1173 = aString1173.substring(0, 12); } else if(anInt1216 == 1) { if(l1 == 8 && aString1174.length() > 0) aString1174 = aString1174.substring(0, aString1174.length() - 1); if(l1 == 9 || l1 == 10 || l1 == 13) anInt1216 = 0; if(flag1) aString1174 += (char)l1; if(aString1174.length() > 13) aString1174 = aString1174.substring(0, 20); }

Lengte ->

if(aString1174.length() > 13)

Read full topic

item.description:

I’m not quite sure if you set the max characters for the password.
